reviewText: ... It's January 2014, and I feel that better books have come out since I posted the original review. Unless you for some reason have a specific interest in the R-based Rattle GUI, I would suggest looking at "Introduction to statistical learning" by James, Witten, Hastie and Tibshirani, or "Machine learning with R" by Lantz.
title: Data Mining with Rattle and R: The Art of Excavating Data for Knowledge Discovery (Use R!)
